Quickstrike:





Quickstrike looked at the cannon. He really didn't need it. He 
couldn't hold it either. He had no real trigger finger, just eight 
fingers on one hand. He had his right on to rely on for firepower. 
That was fine with him. He leaned it against the wall beside his 
other side, and leaned against the frame of the rampway. He watched 
as the others worked on. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> They are on the African continent. Magnas' base.
> 
> DarkMouse::
> She pulled out a large energon blaster and handed it to 
> Quickstrike,"Just in case." she smiled and walked along with her 
load.
> She caught up with Bludgeon and Obsidian. "Hey guys. I don't htink 
we 
> have much farther to go. Just over that ridge it looks like."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:

> > 
> > 
> > 
> > "Sure." He followed.
> > 
> > (What base is this again?)
